title: A Vampire's Guide To Sex
description: Two lives collide in a fated tangle of torrid love. Mal and Dany, both unlucky in love, each have their own problems. However, they do share one thing. They are both vampires.How do you fulfill those basic urges when blood doesnâ€™t flow through your veins? These lovers attempt to answer that question in a passionate, frantic love affair. Like Romeo and Juliette or Bonnie and Clyde, Mal and Dany only have one destiny.
author: Sam Lang
